icmp_receiver module

icmp_receiver.pick(packet)[source]

Source Code

 1from scapy.all import IP, ICMP, sniff
 2import sys
 3
 4# Implement your ICMP receiver here
 5
 6def pick(packet):
 7    if packet.haslayer(ICMP) and packet[IP].ttl == 1: # receiving ICMP packet whose TTL value is 1 
 8        packet.show()
 9        sys.exit(0)
10
11# sniff(filter="icmp", prn=pick) 
12# tried using count=1 here, but it still terminates after 
13# an "incorrect" packet (e.g. a ttl=2), so a stop filter is added
14# edit: stop_filter made it printing the packet twice, so
15# imported sys to simply exit, saw no restrictions about it
